1.name: Black Elastic Sided Boot
1.longDescription:
6 Month Manufacturer’s Warranty

Oliver stands for quality, comfort and protection. That’s why our safety footwear is backed by a 6 month Manufacturers warranty… the Oliver Promise.

Oliver leather safety shoes and boots are warranted for six (6) months from the date of purchase against defective workmanship and/or materials when used under normal conditions for the purpose intended. The warranty is void if in the opinion of Oliver that the product has been misused or subject to excessive wear and tear including exposure to chemicals, cement, lime or heat if the footwear has not been designed to be used in these environments.

As a requirement of this warranty the purchaser must present the footwear and provide evidence of purchase. Please return the footwear to the place of purchase. The footwear will then be returned to Oliver for inspection by an authorized Oliver employee. If the footwear is defective they will be repaired and returned where possible, otherwise replacement footwear will be provided by Oliver.

This warranty is in addition to, and does not limit consumer’s statutory rights.

Our goods come with guarantees that cannot be excluded under the Australian Consumer Law. You are entitled to a replacement or refund for a major failure and for compensation for any other reasonably foreseeable loss or damage. You are also entitled to have the goods repaired or replaced if the goods fail to be of acceptable quality and the failure does not amount to a major failure.

2.name: Grey Safety Gumboot
2.longDescription: The Oliver WB22-205 Gumboot is the new standard in comfort, safety and value. Unlike other brands you don't have to pay extra for safety features, such as built in METprotect® for added metatarsal protection. Our boots have it all for one low price, no catches. Oliver Gumboots feature softer, more flexible PVC that provides superior comfort and movement. Plus thanks to our unique optimized fit, with plush NANOlite® footbed, you'll have more room to flex, especially when kneeling. Features include - Waterproof PVC STEELflex® steel midsole penetration protection METprotect® Metatarsal protection Kick off spur Two trim heights Hard wearing heavy duty PVC / Nitrile sole that offers extra deep tread for greater stability and grip on uneven and loose surfaces

3.name: King's Black Safety Gumboot
3.longDescription: Made from heavy duty PVC with a PVC/Nitrile sole, this King's safety gumboot is ideal for the agriculture, building & construction, manufacturing and food processing industries. A Type 1 Toe Cap offers a wide profile shape to suit your foot and allows greater comfort with no contact to the toe cap. The sole is resistant to solvents, mild acids, alkali's, some chemicals, oils and fats. Wide grip tread for optimum dirt release and traction. Removable footbed for added comfort. Three trim heights. Reinforced ankle, heel and instep for optimum support. Kick off spur on heel for easy removal. Nylon lined for easier cleaning. Anti-static. Meet AS/NZS 2210.3 Standard.

4.name: King's White Safety Gumboot
4.longDescription: This King's waterproof gumboot is made from heavy duty PVC with PVC/Nitrile sole, that is resistant to solvents, mild acids, alkali, some chemicals, oil and fats. The Type 1 Toe Cap offers a wide profile shape to suit your foot and allows greater comfort. The wide grip tread provides optimum dirt release and traction. Removable footbed for added comfort. Three trim heights. Reinforced ankle, heel and instep for optimum support. Kick off spur on heel for easy removal. Nylon lined for easier cleaning. Meets AS/NZS 2210.3 standard.

5.name: King's Black Safety Gumboot With Penetration Protection
5.longDescription:

6.name: Brown Elastic Sided Boot
6.longDescription: The Oliver AT45 work boots give you superior protection and, thanks to Oliver's built in SOFTstride® comfort system, the ultimate in work boot comfort. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver Comfort Footbed enhances natural air flow; infused with Odorban® Control Technology Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® composite toe cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Long wearing TPU outsole designed to self-clean rocks and debris from tread. Excellent abrasion resistance

7.name: Black Elastic Sided Boot
7.longDescription: Our new work boot may be lightweight, but it packs a punch with heavyweight protection. In fact, it's our lightest ever at 55 series work boot and it's loaded with the latest technology and innovation. Features include lightweight sole with self-cleaning tread profile, Oliver COOLstep® plush satin feel lining and built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Features include - Water resistant leather Oliver COOLstep® lining to absorb moisture and odour for optimum freshness and hygiene Kevlar® thread on critical wear seams for maximum abrasion and chemical resistance COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort Latex toe cap liner for added comfort TECtuff® toe guard Long wearing All Terrain rubber outsole designed for superior grip and durability. Anti-Static Deep tread profile with self-cleaning design

8.name: Claret Elastic Sided Boot
8.longDescription: The WB34 series update has raised the bar in durable, lightweight work boot design. Our new hiker style, zip side ankle boot is made from water resistant leather and features the latest in technology and innovation. With the addition of the premium TECtuff® toe bumper, protection and value have never looked so good. So, you might be working hard, but you'll feel like you're walking on air. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

9.name: Beige Elastic Sided Boot
9.longDescription: The WB34 series update has raised the bar in durable, lightweight work boot design. 10.name: Black Elastic Sided Boot
10.longDescription: The Oliver WB26 series of non-safety work boots incorporates all our knowledge from 126 years of manufacturing Australia's top quality, tough workboots, and presents them in a new state of the art, comfortable and stylish package. Using all the durability, performance and comfort features of the leading Oliver safety range. Features include - Water resistant leather COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

11.name: Black Elastic Sided Boot
11.longDescription: Oliver's new PB 38 executive series workboots take you from the worksite to the boardroom in comfort and style. Features include; premium soft touch leather with lightweight sole and steel toe protection, COMFORTcushion® footbed, plus Oliver's built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Executive style never felt so good. Features include - Premium soft touch leather Premium leather lining COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver Comfort Footbed enhances natural air flow; infused with Odorban® Control Technology Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour support Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® Steel Toe Cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Hard wearing PU outsole for superior grip and durability. Anti-static Tread pattern designed for excellent slip resistance

17.name: 150mm Brown Lace Up Boot - Waterproof & Caustic Resistant
17.longDescription: The 100% waterproof and new CORDURA® vamp make these boots ideal for the construction, agriculture, chemical, oil and gas, mining, and quarrying industries. The All Terrain 65-490 boots incorporate new features and engineering advancements such as 100% waterproof technology, full CORDURA vamp for abrasion and caustic resistance, and Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole. Innovative COOLstep® moisture wicking lining and new NANOlite® foot beds draw moisture from the feet keeping them dry and comfortable for all day wear. All this, while reducing the overall weight of the boots. The all new AT65-490 boots are the first in the Oliver Footwear range to incorporate the new and improved SAFETYcell®, which comprises of toe bumper, CORDURA vamp and heel guard, providing the user with all round foot protection from impact and abrasion. Oliver’s continuous innovation and unique product features makes Oliver Footwear renowned for comfort, durability and performance in the market today. Oliver backs itself with a 30-day Comfort Guarantee allowing customers who have been fitted in-store the option to return or exchange the AT 65 490 boots, should they not be satisfied.

22.name: 180mm Wildland Firefighters Boot
22.longDescription: Oliver Footwear's firefighting and emergency services boots are designed to be the safety footwear choice of the relevant agencies and their frontline personnel. Features include - Water resistant and flame retardant leather TECtuff® toe bumper protection, Heavy duty red Nomex® stitching and flame proof laces. The HS66 Series features a Heavy Duty Nitrile Rubber Soling System, with an integrated comfort layer of urethane cushioning. The hard-wearing nitrile rubber outsole, provides a level of comfort and flexibility, unique to Oliver boots.

23.name: 230mm Lace Up Structural Firefighters Boot
23.longDescription: Oliver Footwear's firefighting and emergency services boots are designed to be the safety footwear choice of the relevant agencies and their frontline personnel. Features include - Water resistant and flame retardant leather TECtuff® toe bumper protection; Heavy duty red Nomex® stitching and flame proof laces. The HS66 Series features a Heavy Duty Nitrile Rubber Soling System, with an integrated comfort layer of urethane cushioning. The hard-wearing nitrile rubber outsole, provides a level of comfort and flexibility, unique to Oliver boots.

24.name: 240mm Brown Pull On Riggers Boot - 100% Waterproof
24.longDescription: 100% waterproof, heavy duty, full grain leather make them ideal for the mining and oil and gas industries. New features and engineering advancements include 100% waterproof technology and Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole. The new and improved SAFETYcell®, which comprises of toe bumper, coated leather shell and heel guard, provides the user with all round foot protection from impact and abrasion. Innovative moisture wicking NANOlite® foot bed draws moisture from the feet keeping them dry and comfortable for all day wear. All this, while reducing the overall weight of the boots. Oliver’s continuous innovation and unique product features makes Oliver Footwear renowned for comfort, durability and performance in the market today.

25.name: 150mm Brown Lace Up Boot - Waterproof & Caustic Resistant
25.longDescription: The 100% waterproof and new CORDURA® vamp make these boots ideal for the construction, agriculture, chemical, oil and gas, mining, and quarrying industries. 26.name: 350mm Black Laced In Zip Mining Boot - 100% Waterproof
26.longDescription: 100% waterproof premium full grain leather; Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole; new and improved SAFETYcell® integrated TPU heel and toe and coated leather shell for enhanced abrasion and cut resistance; flush, integrated zip contours to the boot, providing full flexibility and support and allows a custom fit to your leg shape; new Y-Guard TPU ankle protector on both sides of the boot provides impact resistance to the ankle and lower leg, and superior torsional support; S3 rating for waterproof and penetration resistance; reflective panel above the heel provides additional safety for increased visibility in low lighting situations; heavy duty Kevlar® stitching across all critical wear seams; increased padding through tongue and leg for increased support and stability; and internal PORON® XRD metatarsal guard.

27.name: Black Smelter Boot With External Rigid METguard for Added Protection
27.longDescription: Quality heat resistant and flame retardant leather smelter boot with quick release velcro closure and metatarsal guard.

28.name: Black Smelter Boot
28.longDescription: Quality heat resistant and flame retardant leather smelter boot with quick release Velcro closure.

41.name: 130mm Stone Zip Sided Hiker Boot
41.longDescription: Our new low-cut hiker style boot is perfect for a comfortable all day wear at work and play. The Oliver AT45 work boots give you superior protection and, thanks to Oliver's built in SOFTstride® comfort system, the ultimate in work boot comfort. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver Comfort Footbed enhances natural air flow; infused with Odorban® Control Technology Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® composite toe cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Long wearing TPU outsole designed to self-clean rocks and debris from tread. Excellent abrasion resistance.

42.name: 130mm Wheat Zip Sided Hiker Boot
42.longDescription: Our new low-cut hiker style boot is perfect for a comfortable all day wear at work and play, its our lightest ever AT 55 series work boot and it's loaded with the latest technology and innovation. Exclusive to the AT55 Hiker style is the Snug Fit Achilles comfort cushion which keeps the heel firmly in the boot and prevents rubbing. You can also expect all the same great features from the AT55 series includes lightweight sole with self-cleaning tread profile, Oliver COOLstep® plush satin feel lining and built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Features include - Water resistant leather Oliver COOLstep® lining to absorb moisture and odour for optimum freshness and hygiene Lace locking fixture Kevlar® thread on critical wear seams for maximum abrasion and chemical resistance COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort Latex toe cap liner for added comfort TECtuff® toe guard Long wearing All Terrain rubber outsole designed for superior grip and durability. Anti-Static Deep tread profile with self-cleaning design.

45.name: 150mm Brown Lace Up Zip Sided Boot
45.longDescription: This new model 65-490Z complements the existing AT 65 Series range which incorporates features and engineering advancements such as 100% waterproof premium full grain leather and Q-Flex® non-metallic penetration protection insole which is lighter and more comfortable to wear. Oliver’s proprietary NANOlite® fatigue reducing footbeds offer ultimate comfort and enhance blood flow. Innovative COOLstep® moisture wicking lining draws moisture from the feet, keeping them dry and comfortable for all-day wear. Designed to be worn in the most demanding industries such as mining and oil & gas, the new 65-490Z offers a convenient side zip to enable easy release, as well as SAFETYcell® Protection, a fully integrated protective shell that offers enhanced abrasion, impact and cut resistance from harsh working conditions.

52.name: 250mm Brown Pull On Riggers Boot
52.longDescription: The WB34 series update has raised the bar in durable, lightweight work boot design. Our new hiker style, zip side ankle boot is made from water resistant leather and features the latest in technology and innovation. With the addition of the premium TECtuff® toe bumper, protection and value have never looked so good. So, you might be working hard, but you'll feel like you're walking on air. Features include - Water resistant leather Full lining infused with eco-friendly Odorban® Control Technology to absorb odour for optimum freshness and hygiene COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole support NATUREform® Type 1 Toe Cap. Wider profile for greater comfort GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

53.name: Women's Black Slip On Shoe
53.longDescription: Slip into a pair of Oliver's PB 49 series workboots and you'll feel the difference a designer shoe makes. Engineered specifically to suit the unique shape of a woman's foot. Features include lightweight sole with stabilising HEELguard, COOLstep® premium lining and Oliver's built in SOFTstride® comfort system all designed with you in mind. Features include - Water resistant leather Oliver COOLstep® lining to absorb moisture and odour for optimum freshness and hygiene Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour support COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® Steel Toe Cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Long wearing rubber outsole designed for superior grip and durability Tread pattern designed for excellent slip resistance Specifically designed last to support the unique shape of a female foot

57.name: Black Lace Up Executive Shoe
57.longDescription: Oliver's new PB 38 executive series workboots take you from the worksite to the boardroom in comfort and style. Features include; premium soft touch leather with lightweight sole and steel toe protection, COMFORTcushion® footbed, plus Oliver's built in SOFTstride® comfort system. Executive style never felt so good. Features include - Premium soft touch leather Premium leather lining COMFORTcushion® Impact Absorption System uses a combination of cellular urethane and PORON® Oliver Comfort Footbed enhances natural air flow; infused with Odorban® Control Technology Oliver SOFTstride® open cell low density urethane foam for comfort and contour support Shock absorbing Polyurethane midsole NATUREform® Steel Toe Cap Latex toe cap liner for added comfort Hard wearing PU outsole for superior grip and durability. Anti-static Tread pattern designed for excellent slip resistance

58.name: Black Lace Up Ankle Jogger
58.longDescription: The WB34 series update has raised the bar in durable, lightweight work boot design. Our new hiker style, zip side ankle boot is made from water resistant leather and features the latest in technology and innovation. Wider profile for greater comfort GRIPthane® tread pattern for greater traction and heat resistant to 130°C

59.name: GREY FLYKNIT SHOE (S1P HRO SRC ESD)
59.longDescription:
The wait is over- we are introducing our second-generation jogger range, influenced by the look and feel of sports shoes. We designed the Oliver ST40’s to live up to its name, meaning those who wear them can move quickly and easilybecause of the comfortable flexible and lighter design. We built this range with an ergonomic style that mimics the foot’s natural movement, so it feels like you’re wearing your favourite runners.

The breathable stretched textile combined with knitted upper materials, TPU film and 3D mesh lining provide greater comfort and flexibility. Additionally, Oliver ST40’s features our NATUREform® high impact composite safety toe cap to make the shoes even lighter. The ST40’s is also constructed with no metal parts making them non-metallic and airport friendly. The Oliver ST40 range not only provides excellent comfort but also delivers superior protection. For optimised comfort, the range comes with the Oliver Shock Absorber footbed which is breathable, anti-bacterial and designed to protect the heal and ball of the foot. The Oliver ST40 range is high-quality, durable and you won’t have to guess when it’s time to replace them. The patented wear off indicators help identify when replacement is due. This range also offers Electrostatic discharge protection (ESD) to protect wearers from damaging sensitive electronic equipment or igniting flammable materials. Featuring a flexible EVA midsole and 300°C Rubber outsole that helps prevent slipping and the range meets the SRC slip resistance standard. Built for safety. Designed for comfort. The Oliver by Honeywell ST40’s low and mid cut style’s help keep workersprotected from heel to toe.

Learn more by downloading the ST40 brochure or datasheet
